name: Canon EF 8-15MM F/4L Fisheye USM Fisheye Ultra-Wide Zoom Lens - 4427B002

reviews.name: Canon EF 8-15MM F/4L Fisheye USM Fisheye Ultra-Wide Zoom Lens - 4427B002
reviews.reviewText: This lens is Amazing. I had doubts before to buy this lens. Now i'm really very happy with it and surprised about what can I get. i took pictures of wild gooses flying over the Potomac river and the results were incredible. It worth the price.
reviews.title: Incredible lens

reviews.name: Canon EF 8-15MM F/4L Fisheye USM Fisheye Ultra-Wide Zoom Lens - 4427B002
reviews.reviewText: I had been looking at this lens for quite some time and decided that it was too expensive for my uses. I got lucky and received one as a gift and have had so much fun with the lens! I particularly love taking night landscape photos, and this lens is unbelievable for that purpose. The lens cap (as evident reading other 3rd party reviews) is absolutely terrible. From the first time I removed the lens from the box the cap came right off. It barely stays on with normal use. If the camera is around your neck and you hop, the Cap falls off. Great lens, very frustrating lens cap (exasperated by the fact that no UV lens cap can be used with the fisheye design).
reviews.title: Great Camera, Garbage Lens Cap

reviews.name: Canon EF 8-15MM F/4L Fisheye USM Fisheye Ultra-Wide Zoom Lens - 4427B002
reviews.reviewText: Have had lens for 3 months. When I discovered this great lens I immediately looked for reviews. Do to the earthquake in Japan it came to market slowly. I found a supplier with the right price and made the purchase. This is my third fisheye lens and it is beyond my expectations. First test the gorge in Watkins Glen, NY. Used it for stills and unbelievable video on my 7d. Showed results to friends and coworkers who were WOWed! How did you do that was the #1 remark. The versitality in tight spaces is remarkable.
reviews.title: WOW!

reviews.name: Canon EF 8-15MM F/4L Fisheye USM Fisheye Ultra-Wide Zoom Lens - 4427B002
reviews.reviewText: This is the most used and fun to shoot with lens that I own. There were a lot of delays to get this on the market but it was worth the wait. I find all the images are sharp and the focus speed and build quality are fantastic. The only reason I gave the features a 4 out of 5 stars is because the lens cap and hood system are sort of clunky and the cap can easily fall off. I find myself not using the hood either because it shows in the photos. Other than that I have ZERO complaints about this lens.
reviews.title: Best money I have spent on camera equimpent

reviews.name: Canon EF 8-15MM F/4L Fisheye USM Fisheye Ultra-Wide Zoom Lens - 4427B002
reviews.reviewText:
I purchased this lens to be used on my 5d Mark iii and the image quality is amazing. You can capture an entire scene in one frame.

The lens cap does fit loosely but a minor adjustment helps it stay on tight.
reviews.title: Amazing lens!
